hadiths.text: Aishah narrated:"I asked the Messenger of Allah about looking around during the Salat. He said: 'It is a portion which the Shaitan snatches during a man's prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا ذُكِرَ فِي الاِلْتِفَاتِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Mentioned About Looking Around During Salat
